ftPing Struct Reference
[Route Under Mac (RUM)]

#include <mac.h>

Detailed Description

Frame used to ping one node from another node.

This frame is used for both ping requests and responses. This frame is routed by routers virtually unchanged.

Definition at line 659 of file mac.h.
